title: Shining a light on global winds: The Aeolus satellite uses powerful lidar to measure wind speeds - [News]
publisher: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE)
abstract: It's closing time for one of Earth observation's most stubborn and critical data gaps: global wind speeds. A European Space Agency (ESA) satellite set for launch from French Guiana late last month-after nearly two decades of challenging engineering-will be the first to directly measure wind speed and direction, from Earth's surface to the stratosphere.
